author: xstefanx

changelog.release_notes:
The date and temperature font sizes have been scaled back to fit the screen better. 

The loading text for the weather was dropping onto a second line. This has been replaced with "...".

After looking over other watchfaces, and options for the broken clouds condition icon, I'll be omitting it and leaving the cloudy partially cloudy icon in it's place.
I've temporarily assigned the broken clouds description to the cloudy icon. I noticed that there was not an image tied to this condition and needed a quick fix until I can obtain an icon for it.
This is the initial release of Simple Weather F/C, which is a Pebble Watchface that displays the temperature in both fahrenheit and celsius.

description: Watchface that shows the temperature in both Fahrenheit and Celsius.
